description.title: A title for predefined layout
description.cta: Adds button with a link, should conform with the button component specification (title, href)
description.image: An url or path to an image to use as background for the segment
description.video: A video background for the segment
description.focusPoint: Where the focus point should be of an image when container dosen't match image ratio.
description.link: Where the slide should link to
description.theme: The color palette to be used
description.containerColor: Determines what color the container and text should be
description.heroStyle: Gives the slide a hero like appearance with larger text
description.textAlignment: Aligns the text in the container
description.overlay: Adds an overlay to the image
description.slot: A slot for custom content, placed above the predefined layout
description.bottom: A slot for custom content, placed below the predefined layout
